main_text:
Elucidating Methodological Naturalism
3. Elucidating Methodological Naturalism


Like many –isms, naturalism is perhaps better thought of as an
orientation with doctrinal implications than as a doctrine per se.
Nevertheless, we may attempt to elucidate it along several
dimensions.
entry_title: Naturalism in the Philosophy of Mathematics
